Interface ExceptionHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Consumer<Throwable>

    public interface ExceptionHandler
extends Consumer<Throwable>
    A service for handling exceptions.
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)

    • Method Detail

      • accept

        default void accept(Throwable e)
        Equivalent to handle(e).
        Specified by:
        accept in interface Consumer<Throwable>
        Parameters:
        e - exception

      • handle

        void handle(Throwable e)
        Handles given checked exception. It is up to the implementation to decide how it should log / display the exception.
        Parameters:
        e - exception

      • handleFatal

        void handleFatal(Throwable e)
        Handles unchecked fatal exception. The system is likely to shutdown after the exception was logged / displayed.
        Parameters:
        e - exception
